overview: Deep in the heart of Autodale lives their Mayor. As old as the town itself, a once great inventor, now a gangly and decaying but undying thing which the townsfolk have long forgotten, but continue to echo his machine-obsessed beliefs.
tagline: "You think you understand? All the lies? All the needless atrocities?... No. There is reason, and I want to show you..."
title: Immortal Machine
